original_text: They were the most beautiful women in the whole land of Uz. Job said that they should receive some of his things after he died, along with their brothers.
korean_text: 모든 땅에서 욥의 딸들처럼 아리따운 여자가 없었더라 그들의 아버지가 그들에게 그들의 오라비들처럼 기업을 주었더라

sentences.original_text: They were the most beautiful women
in the whole land of Uz
Job said that they should receive
some of his things after he died
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽은 후 그의 것 중 일부를
